interface.name: org.freedesktop.NetworkManager.NetworkNamespacesController
interface.tp:docstring: The Settings interface allows clients to view and administrate network namespaces controlled by NetworkManager.

method.name: ListNetworkNamespaces
method.tp:docstring: List all network namespaces known to/managed by NetworkManager.

method.name: AddNetworkNamespace
method.tp:docstring: Adds a new network namespace. New network namespace isn't persistent accross reboots.

arg.name: networknamespacename
arg.tp:docstring: Name of the new network namespace.

arg.name: network_namespace
arg.tp:docstring: The path of the network namepsace object created.
